channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-30112|2024-06-26T14:02:30.040Z -- hcl%20software -- connections
item.description: HCL Connections is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting attack where an attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user which leads to executing malicious script code. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and comprise user's account then launch other attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-37541|2024-06-25T16:47:00.756Z -- hcl%20software -- connections
item.description: HCL Connections contains a broken access control vulnerability that may allow unauthorized user to update data in certain scenarios.

item.title: CVE-2024-23560|2024-06-17T20:00:33.620Z -- hcl%20software -- devops%20deploy%20%2F%20launch
item.description: HCL DevOps Deploy / HCL Launch could be vulnerable to incomplete revocation of permissions when deleting a custom security resource type.

item.title: CVE-2024-30119|2024-06-17T14:59:56.231Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20optibot%20reset%20station
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station is impacted by a missing Strict Transport Security Header. This could allow an attacker to intercept or manipulate data during redirection.

item.title: CVE-2023-28018|2024-06-04T17:28:57.411Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20connections
item.description: HCL Connections is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper validation on certain requests. Using a specially-crafted request an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause denial of service for affected users.

item.title: CVE-2023-37495|2024-06-04T17:24:42.102Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20domino%20server
item.description: Internet passwords stored in Person documents in the Domino® Directory created using the "Add Person" action on the People & Groups tab in the Domino® Administrator are secured using a cryptographically weak hash algorithm. This could enable attackers with access to the hashed value to determine a user's password, e.g. using a brute force attack. This issue does not impact Person documents created through user registration https://help.hcltechsw.com/domino/10.0.1/admin/conf_userregistration_c.html .

item.title: CVE-2023-37529|2024-06-04T17:24:40.429Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Web Reports component of HCL BigFix Platform can possibly allow an attacker to execute malicious javascript code into a webpage trying to retrieve cookie stored information. This is not the same vulnerability as identified in CVE-2023-37530.

item.title: CVE-2023-37528|2024-02-03T05:27:07.117Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Web Reports component of HCL BigFix Platform can possibly allow an attack to exploit an application parameter during execution of the Save Report.

item.title: CVE-2023-37523|2024-06-04T17:24:34.176Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20bigfix%20osd%20bare%20metal%20server%20webui
item.description: Missing or insecure tags in the HCL BigFix Bare OSD Metal Server WebUI version 311.19 or lower could allow an attacker to execute a malicious script on the user's browser.

item.title: CVE-2023-37539|2024-06-06T22:43:59.255Z -- hcl%20software -- domino%20server
item.description: The Domino Catalog template is susceptible to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. An attacker with the ability to edit documents in the catalog application/database created from this template can embed a cross site scripting attack. The attack would be activated by an end user clicking it.

item.title: CVE-2023-37518|2024-01-30T15:30:50.913Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20servicenow%20data%20flow
item.description: HCL BigFix ServiceNow is vulnerable to arbitrary code injection. A malicious authorized attacker could inject arbitrary code and execute within the context of the running user.

item.title: CVE-2023-37522|2024-01-16T15:59:35.415Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20bigfix%20osd%20bare%20metal%20server%20webui
item.description: HCL BigFix Bare OSD Metal Server WebUI version 311.19 or lower has missing or insecure tags that could allow an attacker to execute a malicious script on the user's browser.

item.title: CVE-2023-37521|2024-01-16T15:55:27.149Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20bigfix%20osd%20bare%20metal%20server%20webui
item.description: HCL BigFix Bare OSD Metal Server WebUI version 311.19 or lower can sometimes include sensitive information in a query string which could allow an attacker to execute a malicious attack.

item.title: CVE-2023-37540|2024-02-23T07:00:59.008Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20sametime%20chat
item.description: Sametime Connect desktop chat client includes, but does not use or require, the use of an Eclipse feature called Secure Storage. Using this Eclipse feature to store sensitive data can lead to exposure of that data.

item.title: CVE-2023-37527|2024-02-02T18:10:04.303Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: A reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Web Reports component of HCL BigFix Platform can possibly allow an attacker to execute malicious javascript code in the application session or in database, via remote injection, while rendering content in a web page.

item.title: CVE-2023-37531|2024-06-04T17:24:21.604Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Web Reports component of HCL BigFix Platform can possibly allow an attacker to execute malicious javascript code into a form field of a webpage by a user with privileged access.

item.title: CVE-2023-37530|2024-06-04T17:24:21.187Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Web Reports component of HCL BigFix Platform can possibly allow an attacker to execute malicious javascript code into a webpage trying to retrieve cookie stored information.

item.title: CVE-2023-37526|2024-06-04T17:24:20.794Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20lucy
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Lucy (now AEX) is affected by a Cross Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) vulnerability. The mobile app is vulnerable to a CORS misconfiguration which could potentially allow unauthorized access to the application resources from any web domain and enable cache poisoning attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-45724|2024-01-03T02:53:23.847Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics product is impacted by unauthenticated file upload vulnerability. The web application permits the upload of a certain file without requiring user authentication.

item.title: CVE-2023-45698|2024-02-10T03:24:40.127Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20sametime
item.description: Sametime is impacted by lack of clickjacking protection in Outlook add-in. The application is not implementing appropriate protections in order to protect users from clickjacking attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-45705|2024-06-04T17:20:04.534Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: An administrative user of WebReports may perform a Server Side Request Forgery (SSRF) exploit through SMTP configuration options.

item.title: CVE-2023-45718|2024-06-04T17:20:03.267Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20sametime
item.description: Sametime is impacted by a failure to invalidate sessions. The application is setting sensitive cookie values in a persistent manner in Sametime Web clients. When this happens, cookie values can remain valid even after a user has closed out their session.

item.title: CVE-2023-45722|2024-01-03T02:59:05.745Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by path traversal arbitrary file read vulnerability because it uses external input to construct a pathname that is intended to identify a file or directory that is located underneath a restricted parent directory. The product does not properly neutralize special elements within the pathname that can cause the pathname to resolve to a location that is outside of the restricted directory. Potential exploits can completely disrupt or take over the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-45715|2024-03-28T14:26:32.839Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: The console may experience a service interruption when processing file names with invalid characters.

item.title: CVE-2023-45723|2024-01-03T02:50:02.258Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by path traversal vulnerability which allows file upload capability. Certain endpoints permit users to manipulate the path (including the file name) where these files are stored on the server.

item.title: CVE-2023-45716|2024-02-09T21:17:50.900Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20sametime
item.description: Sametime is impacted by sensitive information passed in URL.

item.title: CVE-2023-45696|2024-06-04T17:19:57.358Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20sametime
item.description: Sametime is impacted by sensitive fields with autocomplete enabled in the Legacy web chat client. By default, this allows user entered data to be stored by the browser.

item.title: CVE-2023-45706|2024-06-04T17:19:56.506Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: An administrative user of WebReports may perform a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) and/or Man in the Middle (MITM) exploit through SAML configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-45707|2024-06-10T12:58:32.745Z -- hcl%20software -- connections%20docs
item.description: HCL Connections Docs is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting attack where an attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code. This may lead to credentials disclosure and possibly launch additional attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-50341|2024-01-03T02:42:20.178Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by Improper Access Control (Obsolete web pages) vulnerability. Discovery of outdated and accessible web pages, reflects a "Missing Access Control" vulnerability, which could lead to inadvertent exposure of sensitive information and/or exposing a vulnerable endpoint.

item.title: CVE-2023-50347|2024-04-16T19:05:04.652Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by an insecure SQL interface vulnerability, potentially giving an attacker the ability to execute custom SQL queries. A malicious user can run arbitrary SQL commands including changing system configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-50351|2024-01-03T01:45:45.358Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by the use of an insecure key rotation mechanism which can allow an attacker to compromise the confidentiality or integrity of data.

item.title: CVE-2023-50350|2024-01-03T01:50:00.848Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by the use of a broken cryptographic algorithm for encryption, potentially giving an attacker ability to decrypt sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-50346|2024-01-03T01:59:00.314Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by an information disclosure vulnerability. Certain endpoints within the application disclose detailed file information.

item.title: CVE-2023-50349|2024-02-09T20:15:03.715Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20sametime
item.description: Sametime is impacted by a Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability. Some REST APIs in the Sametime Proxy application can allow an attacker to perform malicious actions on the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-50345|2024-01-03T02:01:57.575Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by an Open Redirect vulnerability which could allow an attacker to redirect users to malicious sites, potentially leading to phishing attacks or other security threats.

item.title: CVE-2023-50344|2024-01-03T02:25:23.360Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by improper access control (Unauthenticated File Download) vulnerability. An unauthenticated user can download certain files.

item.title: CVE-2023-50348|2024-01-03T01:52:28.258Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by an improper error handling vulnerability. The application returns detailed error messages that can provide an attacker with insight into the application, system, etc.

item.title: CVE-2023-50343|2024-01-03T02:37:22.668Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by an Improper Access Control (Controller APIs) vulnerability. Certain API endpoints are accessible to Customer Admin Users that can allow access to sensitive information about other users.

item.title: CVE-2023-50342|2024-01-03T02:39:45.432Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by an Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR) vulnerability. A user can obtain certain details about another user as a result of improper access control.

item.title: CVE-2024-23561|2024-04-15T20:35:08.416Z -- hcl%20software -- devops%20deploy%20%2F%20launch
item.description: HCL DevOps Deploy / HCL Launch is vulnerable to sensitive information disclosure vulnerability due to insufficient obfuscation of sensitive values.

item.title: CVE-2024-23557|2024-04-18T18:21:18.690Z -- hcl%20software -- connections
item.description: HCL Connections contains a user enumeration vulnerability. Certain actions could allow an attacker to determine if the user is valid or not, leading to a possible brute force attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-23556|2024-06-06T14:11:00.413Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: SSL/TLS Renegotiation functionality potentially leading to DoS attack vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-23540|2024-04-03T16:32:51.950Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20inventory
item.description: The HCL BigFix Inventory server is vulnerable to path traversal which enables an attacker to read internal application files from the Inventory server. The BigFix Inventory server does not properly restrict the served static file.

item.title: CVE-2024-23583|2024-06-06T14:12:17.019Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: An attacker could potentially intercept credentials via the task manager and perform unauthorized access to the Client Deploy Tool on Windows systems.

item.title: CVE-2024-23560|2024-04-15T19:22:57.295Z -- hcl%20software -- devops%20deploy%20%2F%20launch
item.description: HCL DevOps Deploy / HCL Launch could be vulnerable to incomplete revocation of permissions when deleting a custom security resource type.

item.title: CVE-2024-23576|2024-05-13T21:28:44.325Z -- hcl%20software -- commerce
item.description: Security vulnerability in HCL Commerce 9.1.12 and 9.1.13 could allow denial of service, disclosure of user personal data, and performing of unauthorized administrative operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-23584|2024-04-08T23:05:11.528Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20enterprise%20suite%20asset%20discovery
item.description: The NMAP Importer service​ may expose data store credentials to authorized users of the Windows Registry.

item.title: CVE-2024-23551|2024-05-07T21:46:54.285Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20compliance
item.description: Database scanning using username and password stores the credentials in plaintext or encoded format within files at the endpoint. This has been identified as a significant security risk. This will lead to exposure of sensitive information for unauthorized access, potentially leading to severe consequences such as data breaches, unauthorized data manipulation, and compromised system integrity.

item.title: CVE-2024-23550|2024-06-04T17:45:58.801Z -- hcl%20software -- launch%20%2F%20devops%20deploy
item.description: HCL DevOps Deploy / HCL Launch (UCD) could disclose sensitive user information when installing the Windows agent.

item.title: CVE-2024-23553|2024-02-02T21:03:33.226Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Web Reports component of HCL BigFix Platform exists due to missing a specific http header attribute.

item.title: CVE-2024-23559|2024-04-15T19:07:05.218Z -- hcl%20software -- devops%20deploy%20%2F%20launch
item.description: HCL DevOps Deploy / Launch is generating an obsolete HTTP header.

item.title: CVE-2024-23580|2024-06-04T17:45:41.262Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20optibot%20reset%20station
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station is impacted by insecure encryption of One-Time Passwords (OTPs). This could allow an attacker with access to the database to recover some or all encrypted values.

item.title: CVE-2024-23579|2024-06-04T17:45:40.435Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20optibot%20reset%20station
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station is impacted by insecure encryption of security questions. This could allow an attacker with access to the database to recover some or all encrypted values.

item.title: CVE-2024-23554|2024-06-06T14:12:30.589Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) on Session Token vulnerability that could potentially lead to Remote Code Execution (RCE).

item.title: CVE-2024-23558|2024-06-05T16:21:11.538Z -- hcl%20software -- devops%20deploy%20%2F%20launch
item.description: HCL DevOps Deploy / HCL Launch does not invalidate session after logout which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-30107|2024-06-04T17:39:25.439Z -- hcl%20software -- connections
item.description: HCL Connections contains a broken access control vulnerability that may expose sensitive information to unauthorized users in certain scenarios.

item.title: CVE-2024-30120|2024-06-14T21:44:54.474Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20optibot%20reset%20station
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station is impacted by an Unused Parameter in the web application.

item.title: CVE-2024-30119|2024-06-14T21:36:19.384Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20optibot%20reset%20station
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station is impacted by a missing Strict Transport Security Header. This could allow an attacker to intercept or manipulate data during redirection.

item.title: CVE-2024-30120|2024-06-17T15:01:45.319Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20optibot%20reset%20station
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station is impacted by an Unused Parameter in the web application.

item.title: CVE-2023-37541|2024-06-25T15:08:03.168Z -- hcl%20software -- connections
item.description: HCL Connections contains a broken access control vulnerability that may allow unauthorized user to update data in certain scenarios.

item.title: CVE-2024-30112|2024-06-25T21:28:23.078Z -- hcl%20software -- connections
item.description: HCL Connections is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting attack where an attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user which leads to executing malicious script code. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and comprise user's account then launch other attacks.
